src:
Rafa u stopu prati Novaka: Conga se držao samo jedan set
Nadal u polufinalu na Šapovalova

01 Nov 2019

Prate se u stopu Novak Đoković i Rafael Nadal. Zbog toga i jesu dvojica najboljih tenisera današnjice... Đoković je protutnjao danas do polufinala mastersa u Parizu, a istim putem je nekoliko sati kasnije prošao i Nadal.
Španac je morao više da se potrudi od Srbina, iako je na papiru imao lakši posao. Nekada veliki talenat Žo-Vilfred Conga je odigrao svoj tipični meč: bio je jako dobar jedan set, a kada je njega izgubio, u drugom nije imao ni volje da se bori – 7:6, 6:1.
Stigao je i Nadal do polufinala, u kojem će ga sutra čekati Denis Šapovalov. Do sada su igrali dva puta jedan protiv drugog i skor je 1:1. U 2019. se nisu sretali na terenu, iako je godina pri kraju...
Što se tiče četvrtfinala, Conga je pružio dobar otpor u prvom setu. Svako je držao svoj servis gem, bez ijedne brejk lopte, sve do taj-brejka. A, tu je Nadal bio psihički stabilniji i preciznije ruke, pa je dobio taj deo igre sa 7:4.
Uobičajeno je za Congu da kada protiv favorita na takav način izgubi set, da se u drugom „raspadne“. Nije „razočarao“ ni večeras, za nešto više od pola sata izgubio je drugi set sa 6:1.  Za njega je sezona završena, trebalo bi od ponedeljka da bude 25. teniser sveta.
Nadalov proboj u polufinale sve više smanjuje Đokovićeve šanse da bude broj 1 na kraju godine. U ovom trenutku, posle pobeda obojice tenisera, razlika je 1.280 bodova u korist Španca. Mnogo jeste, nemoguće nije...
Foto: Reuters
text:
Rafa follows Novak in the footsteps: Conga held only one set
Nadal in the semifinals of Shapovalov

01 Nov 2019

They follow in the footsteps of Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal. Because of that, they are two of the best tennis players of today ... Djokovic made his way to the semi-finals of the Masters in Paris today, and Nadal walked a few hours later.
The Spaniard had more to do than the Serb, even though he had an easier job on paper. The once great talent of Jo-Wilfred Cong played his typical match: he had a very good one set, and when he lost him he had no will to fight in the other - 7: 6, 6: 1.
Nadal also reached the semifinals, with Denis Shapovalov waiting for him tomorrow. So far, they have played twice against each other and the score is 1: 1. They did not meet in the field in 2019, although the year is nearing ...
As for the quarterfinals, Conga provided good resistance in the first set. Everyone kept their gem service, without any break balls, until tie-break. And then Nadal was mentally more stable and more precise, so he got that part of the game with 7: 4.
It is common for Congo to lose a set in such a way that it "falls apart" in another. He didn't "disappoint" tonight either, in just over half an hour he lost the second set 6-1. For him, the season is over, he should be the 25th tennis player on Monday.
Nadal's breakthrough in the semifinals increasingly diminishes Djokovic's chances of being No. 1 at the end of the year. At the moment, after winning both tennis players, the difference is 1,280 points in favor of the Spaniard. Many are, it is impossible not ...
Photo by Reuters
